name: ss to ß
description:
In german you can use `ss` and `ß` in the same words. And it will be correct! Like:

`Tschüss` -> `Tschüß`

`Russland` -> `Rußland`

`Weiss` -> `Weiß`

(After the 1996 reforms, the rules changed slightly. Read more: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/%C3%9F#In_pre-1996_orthography)


# Task:

You need to create a function that will change `ss` to `ß`.

`This is my first Kata =)`
